Prem asks Marigold to go home with him for his sister's wedding in Jodhpur. Marigold is entranced by the generosity and opulence of Prem's family during the wedding preparations, but is shocked to discover that Prem has been betrothed to another since childhood. Prem has fallen totally in love with Marigold but has neglected to mention the long-arranged marriage, and his father has not encouraged him to follow his heart.
Prem's fiancé offers to buy Marigold a drink and confesses that although she loves Prem, she doesn't believe he has ever really loved her.
Feeling betrayed, Marigold storms out and decides to return with Barry to the United States. Prem is duty bound to marry the woman his father has chosen.
Barry accepts Prem's invitation to stay the night at his parents' house and then passes out.
